verses.roman:
"āmāra pitā, jyeṭhā haya tomāra dui bhāi
bhāi-bhāiye tomarā kalaha kara sarvadāi

synonyms: āmāra pitā—my father; jyeṭhā—and his elder brother; haya—are; tomāra—your; dui bhāi—two brothers; bhāi-bhāiye—between brother and brother; tomarā—all of you; kalaha kara—fight; sarvadāi—always.
translation: "My dear sir, my father and his elder brother are both your brothers. All brothers always fight about something.
